description: The marmalade in this dish gives it a sticky succulence that is just divine. You can use either 4 lamb shanks or 5 to 6 forequarter chops.
name: Succulent Casseroled Lamb Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When cooked remove from oven and slit open oven bag being careful not to burn yourself with the steam. Serve and enjoy.
